json.text: Port Wine - Follow Ramos Pinto on Facebook (see address above) and be the first to know
about the latest news, events and wines.
Ramos Pinto was founded in 1880 and for several decades its history has been marked by innovation
and respect for tradition. Producing and selecting the best grapes together with systematic knowledge
of the terroir, Ramos Pinto is pioneering the launch of New Douro wines and Port Wine
in Portugal and all over the world.
Today, Ramos Pinto still keeps its position as a traditional house producing high quality
Port Wine and Douro wines. In the quest for excellence, Ramos Pinto is still, to this
day, managed as an independent organization, which enables the pursuit of its extraordinary
politics of own production and continuous technical and technological research.
Ramos Pinto owns four estates in the Douro, from which outstanding Port Wine is made:
Quinta do Bom Retiro and Quinta da Urtiga, in the heart of the region; Quinta dos Bons
Ares and Quinta de Ervamoira in the Upper Douro. Their commitment is to improve our
bond with nature and the environment through organic farming and increasing biodiversity,
leaving this legacy of culture to future generations.
PORT WINE:
Terroir Platinum range (Vintage Port / Late Bottled Vintage Port)
Terroir Gold range (10, 20 and 30 Years Old Tawny Port)
Style range (Adriano Reserve Ruby / Adriano Reserve White / Collector Reserve)
Discovery range (Ruby Port / Tawny Port / White Port)
Lágrima range (Lágrima White / Lágrima Ruby)
DOURO WINE:
Bons Ares (Red and White) Collection (Red)
Duas Quintas (Reserva Especial, Red, White)
For more detailed information about Ramos Pinto Port Wine, Douro wines and quintas,
please visit: http://www.ramospinto.pt
Port Wine
